SELECT course.id, course.name FROM t_teacher teacher, t_course course, t_specialized specialized, t_clazz clazz
WHERE teacher.id = #{teacher} and clazz.id = #{clazz} and course.teacher = teacher.id and course.clazz = clazz.id and clazz.specialized = specialized.id

select id, number, name, buildingType from t_building
id = #{id}
and number = #{number}
and buildingType = 'pedagogical'
and buildingType = 'experimental'
and buildingType = 'other'
and name like '%' #{name} '%'
order by number asc

SELECT course.id, course.name, course.credit, course.courseYear, course.term, teacher.name as teacher,
true as alreadyElective
false as alreadyElective
if(course.id in (SELECT course FROM t_elective WHERE student=#{id}),true,false) as alreadyElective
FROM t_course course, t_teacher teacher WHERE course.clazz=(SELECT clazz FROM t_student WHERE id=#{id}) AND course.teacher=teacher.id
and course.id in (SELECT course FROM t_elective WHERE student=#{id})
and course.id not in (SELECT course FROM t_elective WHERE student=#{id})

SELECT course.id, course.name, teacher.name teacher, course_info.beginWeek, course_info.lengthWeek, course_info.weekDay, course_info.begin, course_info.length, course_info.weekType, room.number roomNumber, building.number buildingNumber FROM t_elective elective, t_course course, t_course_info course_info, t_building building, t_room room, t_teacher teacher
WHERE elective.student = #{id} AND course.courseYear=#{year} AND course.term=#{term} AND elective.course = course.id AND course.teacher = teacher.id AND course_info.course = course.id AND course_info.address = room.id AND room.building = building.id
SELECT student.name studentName, clazz.name clazzName FROM t_student student, t_clazz clazz WHERE student.id =#{studentId} AND student.clazz=clazz.id
